::KitKat::

She looked at Drillbit.  He looked kind of down all of a sudden to 
her.  She walked over and put a hand on his shoulder. "I'm sorry, I 
didn't mean to bite your head off.  It's just that I'm a warrior by 
program and by code. I have to stand up for my leader, and that is 
Megatron at the moment.  You see, if the chain of command breaks, the 
whole chainm goes down.  So that is why one has to stand by their 
leader, no matter what." She smiled warmly and him  "Now let's come u 
with a way to get those plans."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit was about to defend himself to KitKat, when he thought 
better
> of it. He thought Megatron was a good leader, but had been foolish
> lately. Thats why he joined the group in the first place, to take 
over.
> Although his love for KitKat was putting that dream on the back 
burner.
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod pointed a rocket launcher at the prissoner.
> "So, who is he?" He said again.
